projects.name: Photo Exhibiter
projects.technologies: ASP.NET Core 2.0, MySQL/EF Core 2.0, Identity Framework, Bootstrap 4
projects.description:
Social network for photographers.

Functionality:

  • Browse upcoming exhibits(past exhibits expire).
  • Post, Edit, and Cancel(soft delete) exhibits.
  • Search for upcoming exhibits.
  • Attend/unattend exhibits.
  • Follow/unfollow photographers.
  • User notifications (triggered when someone cancels or changes an exhibit).

Features:

  • Authentication provided by Identity Framework.
  • Rich Domain Model with Encapsulated Collections and Operations.
  • Thin Controllers with CQRS Architecture.

projects.name: Rollei Shop
projects.technologies: ASP.NET Core 2.0, PostgreSQL/EF Core 2.0, Identity Framework, Semantic UI
projects.description:
Ecommerce shop.

Functionality:

  • Browse product catalog.
  • Manage product catalog (admin feature).
  • Manage shopping cart.
  • Checkout order and browse order history.

Features:

  • Authentication and authorization provided by Identiy Framework.
  • Server-side pagination.
  • Rich domain model with encapsulated collections and operations.
  • Thin controllers with CQRS architecture.

Add Redis and Fully Deploy project

projects.name: Dapper University
projects.description:
The wonderful Contoso University sample project written in Dapper (and Bulma for the UI).

Functionality:

  • Manage Students.
  • Manage Instructors.
  • Manage Courses.
  • Manage Departments.

All features are complete except for instructor course assignments and filter/sort/pagination (on my TODO list). I also have plans to add Identity Framework(using Dapper in lieu of Entity) for authentication.

projects.name: DevConf (In Progress)
projects.description: In-progress, service-oriented conference planning app. An MVC project powered by a restful API project.

projects.name: Magnum Photos RESTful API
projects.description:
Toy Restful API for Magnum Photos with level 2 maturity. The resources are the agency's photographers and their photography books. The API is documented with Swagger through Swashbuckle.

Features:

  • Get single, child, and collection resources.
  • Create/Delete single, child, and collection resources.
  • Put/Patch child resources for full updates, partial updates, and upserts.
  • Validation and error/fault handling.
  • Paging, filtering, ordering, and sorting.
  • Http caching and rate limiting.
